summary: Girls' Generation, also known as SNSD, is a popular South Korean girl group with eight members. They debuted in 2007 and became famous worldwide with hits like "Gee" and "I Got a Boy." The group has won many awards and is known as "The Nation's Girl Group" in South Korea. They've explored different music styles and were the first Asian girl group to have five music videos with over 100 million views on YouTube. In Japan, they broke records with their albums and concert tours. After a hiatus, they returned in 2022 with their seventh Korean album.
title: Girls' Generation
